verbose_text: To further dissect the mechanism of how proteotoxic stress regulates TGFbeta induced EMT and migration in RPE cells, we measured the phosphorylation level of Smad2, which was involved in the canonical TGFbeta signaling pathway, as wells as the phosphorylation levels of ERK1/2 and FAK, which were involved in the non canonical TGFbeta signaling pathway [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
